description: The setting is an abandoned naval yard. Sky Donovan is a hot hardnumber with a criminal bent! He and fun-loving buddy Sire - a youngblack man with a cock that could choke a whale - are exploring anabandoned warehouse - a room that used to house provisions for anaircraft carrier. There are strange things to discover in this gianthanger, but somehow Sky and Sire end up surveying each other.Unbeknownst to the horny thugs, danger lurks around the corner inthe form of Security Guard Vince Varrone. Captured during themoment of orgasm, Officer Varrone locks the two delinquents up in acage until he can figure out what to do with them. Wiley and sexy asever, Sky and Sire trick their captor into having sex, allowing them toescape in a rain of white hot cum.
title: Cops Gone Bad, Scene #03
